titleStmt.title: A state discourse vpon the late hurt of the French king. Faithfully translated out of French, by E.A.
Discours d'estat sur la blessure du roy. English.
titleStmt.author: Pontaymeri, Alexandre de.
Aggas, Edward.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by E. Allde] for E. Aggas, dwelling nere the west end of Saint Paules Church,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Pontaymeri, Alexandre de. Discours d'estat sur la blessure du roy.

Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
